import ReactDom from "react-dom/client"; import "./card.css" import "./style.css" const root = ReactDom.createRoot(document.getElementById('root')); function MovieCards({ mname, mrating, lastupdate, mreleasedatetime, mtime, mruntime, cardImg }) { return ( <>

{mname}

{mrating}

{lastupdate}

{mreleasedatetime}

{mruntime}

{mtime}

) } root.render( <>
)
